lender.name: Stephen and Kimberly
lender.loan_because: people willing to work should not be poor.

lender.name: Harley & Goya
lender.loan_because: I believe that all efforts against poverty will turn our world a better place to live
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Federal Public Bank

lender.name: Gene & Shelby
lender.loan_because: We want to do what we can to make the world a better place to live. Helping people will help save the world.

lender.name: Jo Lynn
lender.loan_because: I'd just like to help someone else make their great idea become possible when I can.

lender.name: Bob & John
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Rena & Lonnie
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that strangers can virtually join hands and support another stranger in far away land.
lender.occupational_info: I got sick three years ago and haven't worked since.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it is important to lend a helping hand!

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: It is nice to see people wanting to achieve their goals! No goal is too small or too big!
lender.occupational_info: I help children become kind and caring individuals, and of course, I teach them to read!!!!!

lender.name: Ingrid
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have what I have and I want to help other women to become financially independent so that they may feel a sense of empowerment and be able to make the best choices for themselves and their families

lender.name: Justin & Jayme
lender.loan_because: it is our small way of trying to make a difference in this big world.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have the money to lend, and it means just so much more to someone struggling to make it than it does to me.
lender.occupational_info: I do communications work for a nonprofit--editing, media liason, event planning,etc.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I feel that this activity, even in such a small way, connects me to others, enriches my life, helps to counteract my own self-cherishing. It is a chance to humbly pay it forward for all the help given to me in my life. Thank you, Kiva
lender.occupational_info: RN in Boston, MA, USA.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to be able to help others. I believe helping people that want to improve their lives, and also their communities is a positive step for the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a consultant/contractor in the financial services field.

lender.name: Tanys
lender.loan_because: I believe others should have the opportunity to empower themselves

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: It is one small thing I can do to help support working women and men.

lender.name: Troy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the life blood of a health care organization.

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: A rising tide lifts all boats

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference and assist women throughout the world in becoming self-sufficient.

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: poverty sucks!

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: This is the easiest and best way to help people. I loan to women in countries I have traveled and are in clothing or food services.
lender.occupational_info: I design and sew costumes for plays, musicals and dance recitals.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I feel that giving an opportunity to someone to make a living for themselves is the best way to help people. - "Give a person a fish, they eat for a day - Teach them to fish and they eat for a lifetime"
lender.occupational_info: I purchase, Renovate, Manage and Rent residential real estate

lender.name: Alok & Anita
lender.loan_because: - It empowers others to fulfill their dreams. - Small can do wonders.
lender.occupational_info: Write software applications for the healthcare industry.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Joanna
lender.occupation: Donor Relations at Pure Water for the World
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate in my life. It is just one small way that I can have a positive impact on someone else's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Pure Water for the World, a non- profit that helps the rural poor in developing countries by providing clean, safe drinking water, sanitation, hygiene education and health and hope that leads to opportunity.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I can. If a few bucks from me can help change the lives of someone working hard to succeed, then I'm lucky to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: i build websites.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: I consider myself a global citizen in a global economy. It is one way I can make a small but significant impact. You know...Be the change you wish to see in the world...
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to newly arrived immigrants.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I can. I care. And because very few things are more fulfilling than being a small or even a significant part of making another person's dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: I publish community newspapers in Southern California ... creating a sense of belonging in a very large metropolis.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I can. As long as I can comfortably loan out money to those in need, why not.
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for making sure computer software is bug free - whenever someone uses my company's software, I want to make sure they don't run into problems. I'm a software test manager.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: When people are employed it brings a certain degree of meaning to their lives which in turn brings peace and happiness. What the world needs more of.

lender.name: John & Ilene
lender.occupation: Retired rehab counselor & art gallery owner
lender.loan_because: To help assist those who wish to become self-sufficient... besides, it's good Karma.
lender.occupational_info: John is a retired rehab counselor and I owned an art gallery in northern California. We are both retired now and travel a lot. We have two grown sons and four grandchildren.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I know how hard life can be. Knowing $25 can help a mother to better her life makes me happy. I struggle as a single parent and I am humbled to know I am able to reach out to another mother.

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: Micro finance is an endeavor idea and I want like to see it flourish.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software development.

lender.name: Simran
lender.loan_because: "A different world cannot be built by indifferent people." ~Horace Mann

lender.name: Amanda & Brian
lender.loan_because: I recognize I have been blessed and want to help others who are less fortunate.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I am interested in the role of micro-credit to create opportunities for individuals to break their cycle of high interest debt.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it cuts out the middleman and delivers value
lender.occupational_info: I cut out the middleman and pass the savings to the merchant

lender.name: Salvador
lender.loan_because: I believe that all of us can help change the world, even in our own very small ways.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: I want to give back in a meaningful way. I am especially interested in helping hardworking women take control of their own destinies.
lender.occupational_info: I use computers to design text and images, communicating ideas clearly for clients.

lender.name: JoAnn
lender.loan_because: small amounts of capital can make a huge difference to small business success, and thus in the lives of the owners. This is something I can do to change people's lives for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired commercial banker and loan officer who has a personal interest in economic development policy.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: My job is very rewarding. I currently sell Avon and to meet new people and to help them with their needs is such a joy.

lender.name: MARIA
lender.loan_because: I have always volunteered in my children's schools and I was looking for a way to get involved outside of my local area.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: i am use in escritorio

lender.name: Robert & Johana
lender.loan_because: Lending small amounts will make a big change. It is a chance to help other people around the world who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: High School Counselors

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Your opportunities and quality of life should not be determined by where in the world you were born.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books and promote literacy.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving. I have been blessed.
lender.occupational_info: I manage investment property for people who own houses and condominiums. Collect rent, arrange for repairs, etc.

lender.name: Agnaldo
lender.whereabouts: São Bernardo do Campo São Paulo
lender.loan_because: To improve sales of honey and green propolis
lender.occupational_info: I have 43 years old, married and have a daughter with 9 years old and sale honey and green propolis of south of Minas Gerais, Brazil

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping other people

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I know how the impact a small amount of money can have in a developing country
lender.occupational_info: I help improve organizations

lender.name: Dora
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone in this world deserves a chance. This is a wonderful way to give back. Giving makes me feel good! We are making a BIG difference in these people's lives across the world. We are giving them not only a loan, but a feeling of hope and a feeling of accomplishment and success.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a full time artist. I paint with encaustic and oil sticks. I’m inspired by the bold and bright colors that you see while walking around my native Buenos Aires, Argentina.
During the summers I work with children. I own and run a summer camp along with another teachers in the city of Philadelphia.

lender.name: Eugene
lender.loan_because: share, help, for the children

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: As part of my legacy, I want to be known for being willing to help those less blessed than I.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I value helping others achieve a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: There were times when I needed help, and I got it. Now, it's my turn to "pay it forward."
lender.occupational_info: I write young adult and suspense books, and several of my short stories have been published.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I am able.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a homeschooling co-op 2 days per week in my home. The children are ages 2 1/2 to 6 years old. One of my students is my daughter. I seek to give them a better understanding of the world and teach practical knowledge of many subjects.

lender.name: Guigo
lender.loan_because: I think i can help and i believe this money will be well used.
lender.occupational_info: I work for companies creating ads, commercials and more for their products.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in a nation where hard work has allowed me a chance at success. I realize that my success came in part because I was able to receive modest loans from my government and loans from some family members; these loans were used to invest in my education and business ideas. Without such loans to give me a chance to succeed, it is likely that I would not be where I am today. I feel that many people throughout the world are in a state that I was in twenty years ago: they are hard conscientious workers who wish to improve themselves and their lives, but they just need a loan to help get them started. Kiva seems a perfect avenue for me to help these people in their journey towards success.
lender.occupational_info: I used to write computer software and design systems that allow wireless phones to be used to provide data services (such as access to the internet).

lender.name: Norbert & Ruth
lender.loan_because: This is the way the world ought to work.

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.occupational_info: The Lord has richly blessed me so I want to bless others with what He has given me.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: we are all connected.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small mail order business and I also train dogs.

lender.name: Lynwood
lender.loan_because: A small amount goes along ways. You don't have to be wealthy to give and see the difference it makes.

lender.name: Nuno Moreira
lender.loan_because: To mount professionalizing courses of computer science for low income young with the perspective of its first job
lender.occupational_info:
We give to course of “OpenOffice 2”, with applied 2,0 for office. We currently have 12 professors and 320 pupils.
We mount computers from donated parts and we develop didatico material for our pupils with resources of donations.
We need US$ 65,000 to create more 20 classromm.

lender.name: Salete
lender.loan_because: I loan US$ 500,00 because i need to buy new articles of gift
lender.occupational_info: I work in the city selling gifts for the peoples in your houses and working

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in different parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I study hard and like science and reading.

lender.name: Meri
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help other people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I develop online classes. The world is my classroom!

lender.name: Kishore Patel
lender.loan_because: In the joy of others lie your own joy.
lender.occupational_info: I get satisfied when I am able to help others in whatever way I can.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Few of us got where we are without some help.
lender.occupational_info: Import/export law and logistics

lender.name: JP
lender.loan_because: I believe in doing unto others as I would have them do unto me.

lender.name: Jose Manuel
lender.loan_because: Gives me hope...

lender.name: Jens-Christian
lender.loan_because: It just make me feel good and beleive that I make a difference.

lender.name: Cater
lender.loan_because: ITS AWESOME!
lender.occupational_info: I work with a nonprofit in Quetzaltenango, Guatemala to help alleviate poverty through empowerment.

lender.name: Kimberlie
lender.loan_because: I have been given a lot of opportunities in my life and I would like to pay it forward. It is the least I can do.

lender.name: Luis
lender.loan_because: My family and i dont have a house. I want to help my mom. thanks (sorry but my englis isnt perfect)

lender.name: Joshua
lender.loan_because: We just hear about the bad news in our world and that there is nothing a single person can do... This is somthing "I" can do!
lender.occupational_info: I have been a announcer on the radio for twenty years. I play music and say funny things on the air. I enjoy it very much to make people smile every day.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.loan_because: I want to give others a chance to make their lives better.

lender.name: Louis Paul
lender.loan_because: of the Golden Rule
lender.occupational_info: I make computers work

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Selling software that elimates file cabinets and paper in the workplace.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel connected to people all around the world, and reminds me that even the smallest gesture can help change the life of another.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elementary school teacher.

lender.name: Chad T.
lender.loan_because: I have received a great deal of assistance throughout my life and this is a great way to help those whose need assistance.
lender.occupational_info: Doing the right things for the right reasons.

lender.name: Daniel & Toscen
lender.loan_because: We believe this is a better way to help than the way our government passes out money.
lender.occupational_info: Daniel is a computer security engineer & Toscen buys and sells collectible & out-of-print books on the internet.

lender.name: Brandy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others do what they love.
lender.occupational_info: I manage personal bankers and tellers.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I was in a life changing car crash in 2005. I owned and ran my own start up business before that crash. I know how hard it is to start a new life. That's why I help with Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a proud mom and wife who enjoys helping others survive their struggles just like I have.

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: We must struggle for universal access to opportunities. Working people don't need alms, but confidence.
lender.occupational_info: My current work deals with technology. I try to input the power of science into useful tools.

lender.name: l t h
lender.loan_because: I do believe I've become addicted to Kiva, there are certainly worse vices.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: It's what the cool kids are doing these days.
lender.occupational_info: I run a boutique management consulting firm.

lender.name: Alex
lender.occupational_info: I am a nanotechnology engineering student planning to specialize in materials.

lender.name: Lan
lender.occupational_info: I work for a nonprofit that helps people with low vision.

lender.name: Zilda
lender.loan_because: I believe that this people can change yours lives.......
lender.occupational_info: As a physiotherapist, I tried help children and their parents overcome the physical and emocional difficulties

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I work for the education department

lender.name: Maud
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: it just gives me pleasure! That's why we're all here for: to help each other and make our world a happier place for everybody. I believe we were put on this earth to be happy and have good, prosperous lives.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I can't afford to visit all of these countries, but I can afford to have this small connection with people.
lender.occupational_info: I help faculty put their courses online for distance education.

lender.name: Liliana
lender.loan_because: I'm helping someone to believe in her/himself.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: All my life, I dreamed, I worked hard, I believed and I got it! So, I know nothing tastes better than that. If you just give, you take away from the other person that kind of satisfation.

lender.name: Michaela
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy to see people using every available resource to better themselves. I made my first contribution today, and will definitely be coming back!
lender.occupational_info: I am a first year college student in Palatine, Illinois. I plan on working in the advertising industry.

lender.name: Tirza
lender.loan_because: A little help can make a big difference

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I am able to. Everyone deserves a chance. No matter how little. One act of random kindness...thats what makes the world go around.

lender.name: SteppingStones
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to be where I am today and I would like to pass on what has been given to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help women become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Marcia Telles
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good

lender.name: Linden and advisees
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate all my life--good friends, a healthy family, opportunity for the education I wanted, and, now, work that rewards me every day. Participating in Kiva loans will help people who were born into less easy circumstances--which only seems fair to me.
lender.occupational_info: I help students find a way to learn about themselves, others, other times, and other circumstances through the resources our library offers them. Because middle school is a time when that learning naturally moves to action, my advisory group of 6th, 7th and 8th graders is helping raise money for micro-lending.

lender.name: Suzie
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about helping others achieve their dreams and make a difference to the world. Kiva changes lives by empowering individual to create change for themselves, their families and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Welcome!! ☼ I inspire & empower people to live abundantly, embracing change to dream bigger dreams. Use social media to share your passion with the world. ♡

lender.name: Jasmine & Nick
lender.loan_because: A friend connected us to this site, and we are fortunate enough to have the opportunity to pass on that good fortune.
lender.occupational_info: Jasmine works as firefighter for the federal government, and together Nick and Jasmine own and operate a Tree Service. The services offered to residential and commercial customers are, hazardous tree removals, bucket truck work, limbing, climbing, and topping trees, chipping, stump grinding, etc.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I wanted to do my part to make the world a little bit better for someone else.

lender.name: Sgt Keith
lender.loan_because: Having seen the hard-working people of Afghanistan with my own eyes...this is my way of helping them, and others like them, along on their long road to freedom and prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: A member of the US military, doing my part to try and advance freedom and prosperity.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I hope people will benefit from these micro loans.
lender.occupational_info: I study meteors.

lender.name: Kendra
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel good to be able to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I deal with money all day.

lender.name: Fernando Canellas
lender.loan_because: just a small help for who needs more and is searching for a better life

lender.name: Aniya
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to make dreams come true. I feel that everyone should the experience to contol their own dynasty.
lender.occupational_info: Well, at this time I am a full time student at a community college in Georgia. I study hard and long to get the grades I need to get into a four year college. My major is Financing. I chose this field to help low income families think their way out of poverty with a little bit of nothing. I to come from humble beginnings but I will never give up on my dreams.

lender.name: Alix
lender.loan_because: I would like to share my good fortune with others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I care for children with cancer and blood diseases, and I do research to learn more about curing leukemia using the body's own defenses.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: It feels great to help people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Josch1122
lender.loan_because: I want to help reduce poverty around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a plumber for a public agency.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I started out with very little money, but with an education obtained with help from loans, I have been successful. It is my turn and my duty to "pass it on".
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency room doctor. Having worked for 26 years, I am taking some time off from the emergency room. I am volunteering with hospice organizations which are to help cancer patients and their families face the end of life.

lender.name: Toby Church
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live outside of the grip of poverty.

lender.name: Cecilia
lender.loan_because: Feels Good.

lender.name: J. W.
lender.loan_because: The opportunity cost of making 3~4% return with standard bond is well compensated by the idea of actually helping someone. Plus Paypal doesn't pay any interest rate back on current balance, better put this sleeping money to good use!

lender.name: katy
lender.loan_because: i can~ i am lucky to have had people help me when i needed it ~ so am glad to do the same for others. Plus...it's definately a good karma builder :)
lender.occupational_info: I teach 4 year olds. We do yoga, have a garden, do art, and have fun!

lender.name: Pryzym Foundation
lender.loan_because: Advance entrepreneurship in developing countries. Help humanity where it is the most in need.

lender.name: diane
lender.loan_because: I love the way Kiva works!
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids to express their creativity

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: I want to help further capitalism. Work hard and Be Rewarded
lender.occupational_info: I learn!

lender.name: Groton School
lender.loan_because: We are a group of High School seniors who use redeemable recycling to raise money to lend out via Kiva.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I like helping
lender.occupational_info: I sit in front of a computer all day creating and solving software problems.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Sometimes you need a little help before you can help yourself.
lender.occupational_info: I am an emergency nutritionist working with an NGO in Ethiopia.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of the entrepreneur. We all need a hand once and a while.

lender.name: MaryAnn
lender.loan_because: I don't have much money. This seemed like a very good way to help those with even less than me.
lender.occupational_info: I provide a home for developmentally disabled teenage girls who, for various reasons, cannot live with their biological families.

lender.name: Robert & Sabrina
lender.loan_because: We want to try to make a difference.

lender.name: Cathryn
lender.loan_because: Kiva provides an amazing opportunity; to give so little yet be a small part of making a difference in the lives of others. I lived in Panama and traveled across Paraguay, Uruguay, Bolivia, and Peru. The diversity, beauty, heart, and strength of the people were striking and humbling, especially in the midst of poverty and other difficult life challenges and struggles.
lender.occupational_info: Education

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help, where help is needed. Giving should be a part of ones life.

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: Helping others out who need it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Raising my two boys to be wonderful human beings!

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: (1) I can't think of a better way to "help from a distance". (2) I appreciate the feeling of a "personal stake" in the success or otherwise of the borrower.

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves too.

lender.name: Mthandeni Solomon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I have been planning for years to open an Internet and Communication Centre. I need a loan amount of about US$2000. This will help me realize my dreams,.
lender.occupational_info: Providing fax facilities, public phone, Internet cafe and all printing works

lender.name: Muriel Phindile
lender.loan_because: I want to do my own business to help my family. i'm the only one working at home i want to help others too
lender.occupational_info: i need to make a photo lab,which i'm going to start with a printing shop first which need only a computer and a printing machine

lender.name: Stacey and Mark
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed beyond all measure by being born in this country and want to help other people achieve their dreams. We are particularly interested in helping people in Peru because Mark's mother came to the U.S. from Peru in the 1960's.
lender.occupational_info: Stacey helps people who are homebound due to AIDS. Mark works as a technical writer.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because:
*
Everyone should have the chance to better their life through calculated business risks and hard work.
If we can strengthen the bonds between countries and economies through initiatives such as Kiva and other commerce based activities, the results will be priceless.
*

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe we are all connected. Giving is a moral necessity for me.

lender.loan_because: I really want to help in any small way that I can.

lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Communications / Electronics

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: I have to make a difference! You need to make a difference! Everyone can make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I've been working as CTO at i2 tecnologia.

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: As a single parent I know how difficult it can be. People in developing countries lack so many basic amenities that we take for granted every day. Their work day seems so very difficult that if I can send a small amount of money and actually help someone with that I can sacrifice somewhere else in my life. This is the ultimate shopping experience! Most rewarding! Just try it and see if you are not addicted!
lender.occupational_info: I have a very small, and I emphasize small, beading business that I run out of my house. I make beaded jewlery and sell it in small situations. My husband recently passed on and I am mostly trying to focus on my two children for right now.

lender.name: Jeff & Susan
lender.loan_because: God is good!!

lender.name: Takahiro Kohama
lender.loan_because: Good resources are needed for any good work.
lender.occupational_info: conserving nature

lender.name: Poulette
lender.loan_because: it just makes sense!

lender.name: Juliano
lender.loan_because: A small contribution may enable people not only to help themselves but also their community. If these people can find a way to grow their businesses, employ more people at a higher than average wage, improve the standard of their living conditions and also the conditions of those around them. This will make the world a better place to live.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I would want people to help me if I was in their position.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the translation of software and websites into foreign languages.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: RiverviewIB
lender.loan_because: We loan beacuse we want to help alleviate the burden of poverty for those who are less fortunate than we are.
lender.occupational_info: Students

lender.name: Marcelo
lender.loan_because: The idea of helping somebody to have a better life and more independence is wonderful. To do this through a net of friends is perfect. A idéia de ajudar alguém a ter uma vida melhor e mais independência é maravilhosa. Fazer isto através de uma rede de amigos é perfeito.
lender.occupational_info: I am PhD in Genetics and Evolution and I teach in the courses of Biology, Nursing and Nutrition of the University of the State of Minas Gerais (Brazil). Sou Doutor em Genética e Evolução e leciono nos cursos de Biologia, Enfermagem e Nutrição da Universidade do Estado de Minas Gerais (Brasil).

lender.name: Eiichi
lender.loan_because: My brother once told me "favor gets forwarded and comes around." This is me forwarding tiny part of huge favor I got from my parents who raised me.
lender.occupational_info: My job is called "support engineer." I help people use computer so they can solve complex problems (sort of like a teacher). Also, I help Japanese customers communicate with my company's people in the US.

lender.name: Marcos
lender.loan_because: The most important in the world are the human promotion and the inviroment preservation for the total harmony. We sponsor the ECOHUMANO INSTITUTE and Centro de Atualização da Mulher - CAM
lender.occupational_info: An opportunity´s door for peoples and organizations to development deals around the world. Particular enjoy all Countries. Now we are funds to projects, install, import-export to Africa, Asia, Oceania and Latin America.

lender.name: Dea
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in life and want to pass that on to others. I am so excited to be able to help people who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Kosuke
lender.loan_because: I just want to make some contribution to people who need help. That's all. The world should help each other.
lender.occupational_info: My motto is " make the impossible possible by helping each other".

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because:
"...I was hungry, and you gave me food to eat. I was thirsty, and you gave me drink. I was naked, and you clothed me..."
"...Lord when did we see you hungry, and feed you; or thirsty, and give you a drink, or naked, and clothe you?"
... and God replied, 'Whatever you did to one of the least of my brothers, you did it to me.' Matthew 25:35

lender.name: Cathy H V
lender.loan_because: I can recycle my help. When a loan is paid, I can put that money out there again.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: I see these kind of efforts like the only real and effective way to finish with the poverty in the development countries. And also because after knowing about kiva I would not feel okay if I would not have made a loan. It is basically our obligation to help all these working people.

lender.name: maritza
lender.loan_because: it feels good :)
lender.occupational_info: I do stream and wetland restoration. We have many streams & wetlands here in NC that have been degraded from their natural state. My job involves improving them.

lender.name: Shane
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to invest in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I advise people on how to get their ideas across to others through the media.

lender.name: Jemile and Andrew
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help give someone the opportunity to help their family, their community and themselves.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.occupational_info: I work with my family in a business that builds apartments, condominiums and office space. We manage the buildings after construction. We have a second business that consists of three restaurants and two breweries in Eastern Washington and North Idaho.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Simone
lender.loan_because: I have been truly blessed and believe giving and assisting other individuals in achieving their dreams, is truly a way of clearing a path for more blessings in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I reconcile financial statements and do reports and representation for a small wireless company.I also enjoy offering sound financial advice to friends and anyone who need it.My motto live to give.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I want to help those less fortunate who are working hard to help themselves as well.

lender.name: John & Susan Howell
lender.loan_because: We like helping people who provide goods and services useful to others.
lender.occupational_info: Susan is a retired reading teacher. John works in the computer software industry.

lender.name: Deidra
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I help people in inner city Boston finance the start-up, growth, and stabilization of their businesses.

lender.name: Min Siang
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at some point of their lives. I am fortunate to have my friends and family there for me, so this is my little way of sharing with others.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: In the past I have felt that when I gave to charity organizations the money got divided up and only a little bit got to the people that needed it and then only as a hand-out. Microcredit gives loans not hand-outs to individuals motivated to getting themselves and their family out of poverty. If giving what amounts to pocket change for most of us can make a difference then why not give a little.
lender.occupational_info: My job involves clinical research and medical device development

lender.name: Biondi Family
lender.loan_because: we want people around the world to know we care about them.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with the resources to reach my goals and want to help others do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelance Spanish>English translator. I translate Spanish into success for individuals, businesses, and nonprofit organizations!

lender.name: Skellie
lender.loan_because: Growing businesses have multifaceted benefits: for both entrepreneurs and employees.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer. My main goal is to produce ideas that other people can use.

lender.name: ajani
lender.loan_because: i what to purchase a modern printing machine and computers
lender.occupational_info: printing of stationeries, invitation cards, calenders

lender.name: yuri
lender.loan_because: I'm needing a help to purchase some books and painkillers to me and my family, i'm from Brazil, and here the education is so bad!

lender.name: Roshawn
lender.loan_because: It is my responsibility as a Christian to give to those in greater need than myself. This is a great way to empower people without giving handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an Organizational Leadership Major at Azusa Pacific University.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I go out with a camera crew and capture real life and translate it into a story. Actually, I kind of hope one day that my work will lead me to cross paths with someone I've lent to!

lender.name: John & Kelly
lender.loan_because: To provide help outside my community...
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales while Kelly works for the Red Cross.

lender.name: SCHC
lender.loan_because: Kiva is genius and could potentially shift, on a massive scale, the world as we know it.
lender.occupational_info: We are an addiction healthcare clinic that treats male clients needing medical help to regain their mental and physical health.

lender.name: Elizabeth & Kelly
lender.loan_because: We want to share prosperity with others around the world through this very personal type of giving, as though sharing with a friend.

lender.name: Michael and Holly
lender.loan_because: Instead of having money sitting in a bank in an effort to gain wealth, why not use it to allow someone to make thier life better?

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because:
I firmly believe that the best way to assist people is to help them help themselves. I have been to the former Soviet Union many times and I know how incredibly difficult it is for the average person to successfully run a business. So that is the part of the world where I would like my assistance to go to.
The picture of me is taken in front of a statue of Pushkin that was given to the city of Minsk, Belarus by the city of St. Petersburg, Russia.
lender.occupational_info: I work at an organization that conducts applied research into sustainable land and resource management. What I do is communicate those results to practitioners and the general public. I also assist in developing workshops, forums and courses teaching people how to use our tools and products.

lender.name: Marnie + Pierre
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help others.

lender.name: Taylor Family
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed and desire others to be as well.
lender.occupational_info: We are a busy family of seven!

lender.name: Fabio
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business consultant. I help companies to perform their businesses better

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I want to help other woman entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I test new computer programs to make sure they work.

lender.name: Usha
lender.loan_because: Because I want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Being a mom is the same, no matter where you are.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do, we should all help others when we are able.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed to have the life I have. It's a privilege to pass good fortune along to others who are willing to work for their dreams.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: Sometimes, people just need a helping hand and second chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high school students and teach them how to live healthier lives. I also work closely with the athletic teams, assisting them with their injuries and injury prevention.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: My family is blessed with so much that I want to help others become self sufficient and help them to accomplish their goals.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: With Kiva I can go beyond donation and help through sustainable giving.

lender.name: Donna and Tom
lender.loan_because: We are backbackers and have seen the poverty in 68 countries. This is so easy and anyone can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: We own five small houses that we rent to other families.

lender.name: Caitlyn
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Nathaniel Brooks
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ability of local entrepreneurs to drive positive change.
lender.occupational_info: Project Healthy Children helps governments in the developing world design comprehensive programs to get people the vitamins and minerals they need.

lender.name: Theresia
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Diaper Parties consultant - I show people what kinds of cloth diapers are available and help them choose what works best for them.

lender.name: EMMANUEL
lender.loan_because: of 2 main reasons: - helping others is just simply meaningfull and fullfilling - to show that capitalism can actually be used to serve one's humanitarian/social concerns

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I think everyone deserves opportunities.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: "We cannot live for ourselves alone." ~ Herman Melville

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. My children and I are doing this as a family. I feel a person must lead by example. My children and I love the Kiva website and wish the whole world knew about it! We learned about the site from the Oprah show on giving. Thanks Oprah!
lender.occupational_info: Retired U.S. Navy Nurse

lender.name: Priscilla
lender.loan_because: It's a long-distance act of cooperation.

lender.name: Keaton
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I help hospitals achieve better financial performance

lender.name: Wendy and Darrin
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.

lender.name: Jori
lender.loan_because: I can do it and I like to help
lender.occupational_info: I am a 19 years ols student from Amsterdam. I work at Apple and like to enrich lives.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because:
What can I say... I'm a giver!
I believe in supporting others that just need that extra push to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company find qualified individuals to bring on as employees.

lender.name: Pablo
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky in life and believe that we need to help our luck. To me this entrepreneurs are people who are willing to help thier luck so I am willing to share part of my luck with them. Sharing luck brings hope.

lender.name: Wasim
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Alessandro
lender.loan_because: There is nothing like the pure joy of giving and being able to lend a hand to someone who just needs a little help to better their lives for them and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I find and rent apartments for New York City residents. I also love to study Ballet in my spare time.

lender.name: Yvonne
lender.loan_because: I care =)
lender.occupational_info: Knowledge is power!

lender.name: Brigit
lender.loan_because: It helps people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I worked my way up from receptionist to a producer after I arrived in the U.S. from Denmark. Work hard and do a good job....

lender.name: Cynthia and Charles
lender.occupation: Special Education teacher and US EPA
lender.loan_because: "All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." J.R.R. Tolkien
lender.occupational_info: We work for the children and the planet.

lender.name: suzanne
lender.loan_because: I was impressed to loan because I would love to see someone successful in their own business. My son has his own business and hopefully by loaning a small amount it will help the members of kiva to become self reliant
lender.occupational_info: I work in an insurance agency selling auto coverage, homeowners coverage and life insurance.

lender.name: Zawadi
lender.loan_because: To make a difference

lender.name: GlenlawnELions
lender.loan_because: We want to provide a hand up to the developing world; "teach a man to fish rather than give a fish".
lender.occupational_info: High school students learning how to make a difference.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's a tremendous way to impact a person, family and community. Lending money to business owners will build the economy and make a lasting difference.

lender.name: Morgan
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently a student and work part time

lender.name: Nathalie
lender.loan_because: I have lived in very poor countries, saw first hand how this works and feel we all have a responsibility to help and microcredit is an important tool of development and empowerment.

lender.name: marcia
lender.loan_because: I see the best in everyone and I know they need a start to help them get going.

lender.name: Claudine
lender.loan_because: I want a better world for my kids. This is a great way to reach out and help individuals that are seeking to improve their quality of life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Gonzalez
lender.loan_because: love helping others it is a great feeling

lender.name: Dee Waluk-Johnson
lender.loan_because: We are stewards not only of our planet, but also of our race.
lender.occupational_info: I am a married, independent woman, with my own business (Sundog Solutions Consulting). I partner with companies and employees in hopes of creating better communications, relations, and working environments.

lender.name: Scott & Marilyn
lender.loan_because: we want to help to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Wendy & Paul
lender.loan_because: I can pay it forward numerous times with just $25 at a time. I want other people to be able to fulfill their life dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Insurance broker helping construction companies obtain insurance for their construction projects all over the USA. My husband is a high school history teacher and football coach.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it is a way to reach out from my home and share with others. I believe in people, their hopes and their dreams to build stronger families and communities.

lender.name: Chris, Tracy & Carson
lender.loan_because: We lend because we have been very, very blessed. People can do amazing things with just a little bit of help. We wish you all the greatest success.
lender.occupational_info: Chris' company sells photo ID equipment via the internet: www.idwholesaler.com Tracy works for http://www.ecolab.com.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I can! – I believe it is important to help people whenever whereever you can, if you capable of it. So I want to share my good fortune with people less fortunate, and by doing so, I hope to make a small (or even better a big) difference for someone who wants to change her/his life for the better! (-:
lender.occupational_info: As a graphic designer I produce visual solutions – primarily for printed or electronic media – such as brochures and advertising. I also do volunteer work, and have done so for many years.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a difference

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I was formerly in Peace Corps and have seen poverty and believe in what can be accomplished by individuals who receive small amounts of assistance.

lender.name: Jose Arturo
lender.loan_because: I´m also an entrepreneur, have and had business and understand the problem that is getting founds to start or upgrade your business.
lender.occupational_info:
I´m a Software Engineer as main job and a entrepreneur in my free time. I have had cyber-coffe, video-club, now I have video game machines installed in grocery stores in Monterrey, I give 40% of the income as comition to the store owner helping booth business to be profitable.
I´m also a member in the bux.to community, and I get paid for viewing advertising. Visit bux-to-mty.blogspot.com for more info.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's part of being a good world citizen.

lender.name: Yannick
lender.loan_because: I think that people don't come to this world with an equal chance to be happy and have a good life quality and that's why we should help each other.

lender.name: Roni
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a hand up not a hand out. I believe everyone deserves a chance and third world countries and people who live there don"t have the same opportunites that I received so I would like to help someone and give back some of the opportunites that helped me to help myself.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want others to succeed

lender.name: Vikas
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering people, rather than giving them a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student at the University of Western Ontario and currently in my 4th year. I am really amazed by the power of microcredit in the field of poverty alleviation. Please help support endeavors that help people help themselves.

lender.name: BriAnne
lender.loan_because: I want to see women of the world succeed!

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: To help deserving people get started that otherwise wouldn't have the opportunity

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: sometimes people just need a little help.

lender.name: Dave and Kim
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We help landlords choose the right people to rent apartments to.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I want to "pay it forward"...people have helped me so much, I just want to be able to help someone as well.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working at Walmart as a cashier. I'm currently working towards my BS in Psychology, only got 1.5 years to go! Yay me!! Better late than never I say!

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help those who are not as fortunate as me. I'm also fascinated by the idea of the microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student majoring in Finance

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: Because I can.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I understand that it often takes more than hard work and perseverance to be successful. It is an honor to be able to provide financial assistance to people with ideas and commitment to reach their goals.

lender.name: Toto
lender.loan_because: I've been fortunate so far and it's time to help others and give back. Giving is my greatest joy.
lender.occupational_info: Artistic, creative, innovative and challenging.

lender.name: Shara
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I build online communities.

lender.name: LoRonce
lender.loan_because: I want to invest in people who are working to shape their lives. I am interested in being a part of that process.
lender.occupational_info: I give information to travelers about which bus or train to take.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference on someone's life...my small contribution may just do that!

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: I wish to help other women
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I prepared taxes and managed money for others
